info.name: Etherscan.io Dark (Source Viewer) fix Solar-mode
info.description:
This is the Etherscan Dark (Source Viewer) fix Solarized-mode Edition for Etherscan.io Steps on how to use User styles - 1. Visit 'Stylus' Brave/Chrome extension https://greasyfork.org/en/help/installing-user-styles 2. Click on 'Install as user style' button 3. Stylus will then handle user styles according to preferences
Etherscan is a Block Explorer and Analytics Platform for Ethereum, a decentralized smart contracts platform.
